title: Level 2 International Award in Health and Safety in the Workplace
description: Provides basic knowledge of health and safety practices essential in the workplace. Achievement of this qualification will enable learners to work safely, recognize hazards, and implement cost-effective, practical control measures.
deliveryMethod: Face to face - Classroom, Online via Zoom
targetGroup: Learners working in any environment or preparing for their first job.

title: Basic Food Safety Training
description: Educates individuals on essential food safety practices to prevent foodborne illnesses. Topics include hygiene, sanitation, and food handling techniques.
deliveryMethod: Face to face - Classroom, Online via Zoom
targetGroup: Food handlers in restaurants, catering, hotels, and warehouses.

title: Advanced Pest Control Training
description: Designed for experienced pest control professionals to enhance their expertise. Covers advanced pest biology, innovative control techniques, and regulatory compliance.
deliveryMethod: Face to face - Classroom, Online via Zoom
targetGroup: Certified pest control technicians, supervisors, and managers.
emirates: Dubai, Sharjah, Ras Al Khaimah, Fujairah

title: Level 4 International Award in Managing Food Safety for Catering
description: Equips managers with advanced knowledge to manage food safety in catering and retail environments, ensuring safe practices and compliance.
deliveryMethod: Face to face - Classroom, Online via Zoom
targetGroup: Food safety managers, auditors, trainers, and QA staff.

title: HACCP Awareness Seminar
description: Provides practical knowledge to reduce food poisoning risks through HACCP principles, aimed at food handlers and QA personnel.
deliveryMethod: Face to face - Classroom, Online via Zoom
targetGroup: Supervisors and team leaders in food operations, QA personnel, and HACCP team members.

title: ISO 22000:2018 Implementation Training
description: Comprehensive training on implementing ISO 22000 standards for food safety management systems. Participants will gain practical skills for compliance and continuous improvement.
deliveryMethod: Face to face - Classroom, Online via Zoom
targetGroup: Supervisors, middle management, quality assurance staff.

title: Water Tank Cleaning & Disinfecting Training
description: Equips participants with knowledge and skills for water tank cleaning processes, ensuring safety and compliance with municipal regulations.
deliveryMethod: Face to face - Classroom, Online via Zoom
targetGroup: Technicians and supervisors in water tank cleaning and maintenance.
